name: places/ChIJmU5WK1lZwokRXAbIT2OJhi8
formattedAddress: 128 E 84th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 128 E 84th St, New York, NY 10028-0978, USA

originalText.text:
I have been going to Kadir for about 5 years and followed him to beautiful Honeybliss :).
He is talented and the nicest person.
You walk into his business and ambience is warm and welcoming. It’s been awhile and I really needed a change. He will ask you for any inspirations, wants and needs. I always check his instagram for ideas because his work is amazing. He will actually listen to what you want , throw his idea and voila. You will be leaving there with your confidence boosted, happy and feeling beautiful. Attaching photos of some of the times I wanted something different and Kadir did not disappoint. You will not regret going to see Kadir for any balayage, haircut and styles. His staff and assistant Julia are also very friendly and sweet . You will not regret it.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Honeybliss Salon. Each time I went in to color my hair,  my experience was great! I felt like they listened to what I wanted to do, offered their professional opinion, and have never disappointed me. I always left the salon feeling and looking beautiful and could not be more satisfied!!! Definitely come here if you’re looking for a new hair stylist. I’ve been going to Jess and he gets the job done every time!!

text.text: I highly recommend Honeybliss Salon. Each time I went in to color my hair,  my experience was great! I felt like they listened to what I wanted to do, offered their professional opinion, and have never disappointed me. I’ve been going to Jess and he gets the job done every time!!

originalText.text: I've tried so many salons in NY area and Kadir is the best. I have really thin hair and he was able to lighten my hair to the desired tone very slowly and carefully without breaking nor burning a single hair strand. If you need a balayage or highlights this is the place to go

text.text: I've tried so many salons in NY area and Kadir is the best. I have really thin hair and he was able to lighten my hair to the desired tone very slowly and carefully without breaking nor burning a single hair strand. If you need a balayage or highlights this is the place to go

originalText.text: First time I did balayage and it came out as exactly what I wanted!! I had natural dark brown thin East Asian hair and i am so happy with my new hair♥️ I am also so amazed how they were efficient and kind. Explained everything and informed me of the price beforehand. Definitely worth the price, i will come back.

text.text: First time I did balayage and it came out as exactly what I wanted!! I had natural dark brown thin East Asian hair and i am so happy with my new hair♥️ I am also so amazed how they were efficient and kind. Explained everything and informed me of the price beforehand. Definitely worth the price, i will come back.

originalText.text: As a former hairstylist I knew my color correction was going to be a project. After thorough research and a consultation with Kadir I thought he would be a perfect fit and boy he delivered! He attentively listened to my wishes and came up with a plan of execution and my hair looks beautiful! I absolutely love it!! If you have any doubts don’t! He is passionate about his craft and has a ton of experience. You will leave with beautiful healthy hair! Love the salon and the energy and will be back for my monthly touch ups. Super grateful! Thank you so much!!

text.text: As a former hairstylist I knew my color correction was going to be a project. Thank you so much!!
